questions.question: What is cost estimation?
options: The process of predicting the cost of a project
The process of reducing project costs
The process of increasing project costs
The process of managing project risks
questions.answer: The process of predicting the cost of a project

questions.question: Which of the following is a common method of cost estimation?
What is the purpose of a cost baseline?
options: To provide a basis for measuring project performance
questions.answer: To provide a basis for measuring project performance
